item.title: French Bulldog Home Made Treats | Ethical Frenchie
item.author: adopt@ethicalfrenchie.com (James Harrison)
item.description: Choose home made over store bought. You will know exactly what your French Bulldog Puppy is eating and avoid any stomach/allergy issues.

item.title: Home Cooked Food For Your French Bulldog | Ethical Frenchie
item.author: adopt@ethicalfrenchie.com (James Harrison)
item.description: 1. Beef Stew by Canine Journal Ingredients 1 pound of beef stew meat 1 small sweet potato 1⁄2 cup of carrots, diced 1⁄2 cup of green beans, diced 1⁄2 cup of flour 1⁄2 cup of water or organic vegetable oil, plus 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil for frying Total: Makes approx 4 cups (or 32 fluid ounces)

item.title: Dog Food Brands We Trust For Our Frenchie
item.author: adopt@ethicalfrenchie.com (James Harrison)
item.description: Even the best kibble is still highly processed at the end of the day, so make sure you add fresh fruit like blueberries and veggies to every meal.
